729262f-a.title: Richmond: Olympia Boulevard - Orlando Street
729262f-a.text:
Olympia Boulevard, north side, at the head of Orlando Street,
showing De Maso's Inn. In 1907 it was known as the ''Sunnyside.''
This part of the boulevard was formerly Old Town Road.
August 25, 1929
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729262f-a.folder: Olympia Boulevard & Orlando Street, Staten Island, NY
